mapper.sql: id, phone, app_code, app_name, create_time, start_time, update_time, end_time, is_enabled
mapper.update:
update notice_phone_white_list
phone = #{phone,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
app_code = #{appCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
app_name = #{appName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
create_time = #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
start_time = #{startTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
update_time = #{updateTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
end_time = #{endTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
is_enabled = #{isEnabled,jdbcType=INTEGER},
where id = #{id,jdbcType=BIGINT}
mapper.insert:
insert into notice_phone_white_list (phone, app_code, app_name, create_time, start_time, update_time, end_time, is_enabled) values
(#{item.phone,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{item.appCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{item.appName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{item.createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{item.startTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{item.updateTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{item.endTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{item.isEnabled,jdbcType=INTEGER} )
